attributes.action: change the laws regarding servicing boilers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to many people living in an estimated 3.5 million homes with boilers and back boilers,
we would like the law to be changed so that all aspects of boilers are serviced including thermostates.
children are dying and getting injured and homes are destroyed when for eg thermostates break down.

we would like the law to include thermostates and all other equipment relating to boilers  to be tested as standard.

government_responses.details:
